r.d: A succinct parallel concurrency API for PHP 7 and 8.
r.n: - Add PHP 8.5 to CI #349 - Add a reference to argc and argv to child threads #351 - Add function to expose parallel worker threads #352 - Refactor: Replace deprecated Zend types with standard C99 types #353 - Handle calling functions from global scope #355 - Convert ZEND_INIT_FCALL to ZEND_INIT_FCALL_BY_NAME #356 - Add clang formatting rules #361 - Switch Windows CI to `php-windows-builder` #362
